sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
ready
, je pripravljen ali nared za kaj oziroma ima prave lastnosti za kaj.

seg.quote: You're nowhere near ready for such a job.
Their crops would soon be ready for harvesting.

sense.def:
To be ready to do something
pomeni, da je človek voljan nekaj narediti ali da bo vsak hip nekaj naredil.

seg.quote: ...couples who are ready to move house in order to get work.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
ready for something
, tisto potrebuje ali želi.

seg.quote: We were all ready for sleep.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
ready
opisujemo stvari, ki so hitro in zlahka dostopne ali na voljo.

sense.def:
To ready something
pomeni pripraviti nekaj za poseben namen;

seg.quote: The satellite would be readied with all possible haste.
